Sentencas: We report a new sealant material for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) using glass-ceramic, A glass-ceramic based on the CaO-Al2O3-SiO2 system was selected as a sealant because it can be easily molded to give a gastight seal and remains in a solid-like state under typical fuel cell operating conditions.
Titulo: A new sealant material for solid oxide fuel cells using glass-ceramic

Sentencas: Calcium alumina silicate glass powder is placed in the gas-sealing area before crystallization.
Titulo: A new sealant material for solid oxide fuel cells using glass-ceramic

Sentencas: During heating, the glass softens and bonds with the SOFC components.
Titulo: A new sealant material for solid oxide fuel cells using glass-ceramic

Sentencas: At higher temperatures, bulk crystallization occurs in the glass and the viscosity of the glass-ceramic sealant increases.
Titulo: A new sealant material for solid oxide fuel cells using glass-ceramic

Sentencas: We show that this sealing material which is able to seal at higher viscosities compared with the melt sealing method produces a good gas-tight seal and is chemically stable in contact with SOFC components, e.g., yttria-stabilized zirconia electrolytes and lanthanum chromite separators.
Titulo: A new sealant material for solid oxide fuel cells using glass-ceramic
